1.content: You wake up after hearing you alarm clock go off. Cosmo and Wanda then greet you with their usual “good morning Timmy”. Later on in the day you prepare to make your first wish. You then begin to say “I wish” but cosmo cuts you off thinking he knows what your going to wish for. Cosmo then waves his wand in the air and then a magical poof. Later you find out your now. What happened?
1.title: Timmy’s weird day

info.description:
You will roleplay as Timmy turner a boy who was gifted magical fairies named cosmo and Wanda
But what happens when cosmo messes up a wish and puts Timmy in a place he would never thought he would end up.

(Rules)
(Main character can’t die so don’t try it)
(You must stay in first person throughout the whole story)
(You can be a little sexual but not to sexual)
(Don’t add your own oc’s into the story)

Enjoy the story and let’s begin
